definitions.text: pneumatic tire that has radial-ply casing
relating to or near the radius
examples: the radial aspect of the forearm

definitions.text: relating to or moving along or having the direction of a radius
issuing in rays from a common center; relating to rays of light
arranged like rays or radii; radiating from a common center
examples: a starlike or stellate arrangement of petals
many cities show a radial pattern of main highways
